TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTitle extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl

Docs.summary: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> class to programmatically specify the HTML `<title>` element of a Web Forms page.
> [!NOTE] > You can also set the page title by using the `title` attribute of the [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive, or by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Title%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to display the current date and time in the title bar of the Web page.
<!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/CS/htmltitlecs.aspx#1)] --> <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/VB/htmltitlevb.aspx#1)] -->

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> control using default values. It creates an HTML `<title>` element on the Web page. The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> class.
|Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>|The "title" literal string.|
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to display the current date and time in the title bar of the Web page.
<!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/CS/htmltitlecs.aspx#1)] --> <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitleClass/VB/htmltitlevb.aspx#1)] -->

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void AddParsedSubObject(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: An that represents the parsed element.
Docs.summary: Notifies the control that an XML or HTML element was parsed and adds that element to the collection of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the element added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> control is a <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> control, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle.AddParsedSubObject%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle.Text%2A> property with the value of the literal string; otherwise, the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AddParsedSubObject%2A> method is called. The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle.AddParsedSubObject%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.ControlCollection CreateControlCollection() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new collection for the control.
Docs.returns: A object to contain the current server control's child server controls.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed

Docs.param: A that contains the output stream to render on the client.
Docs.summary: Renders the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle.Render%2A> method first calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderBeginTag%2A> method using the `Title` member of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag> enumeration. Next, any child controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> control are rendered. Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter.RenderEndTag%2A> method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Text { get; set; }

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the text of the HTML element.
Docs.value: The text of the HTML element. The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle.Text%2A> property to specify or determine the title of the Web page.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle.Text%2A> property of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTitle> control to dynamically change the title of a Web page.
